attributes.action: Re-instate practical driving test for the critical workers during lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Majority of the critical workers require daily driving to discharge their duties , specifically, Nurses and Healthcare assistants travels to clients homes or hospitals for shifts 
For convenience, driving is essential in reaching their clients but this has been jeopardised ever since driving tests are stopped/postponed following restrictions 
Many people , including healthcare workers , are frustrated and have their driving tests cancelled severally by the DVLA
attributes.background: We want the DVLA to resume driving test for the critical care workers as soon as possible as driving is essential for their jobs

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow driving tests and lessons for Keyworkers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
